item.title: How OPEC+’s battle for oil market share could hurt U.S. shale producers
item.description: The energy cartel’s latest move suggests that “defending market share now outweighs defending prices,” one economist says.

item.title: Why Palantir is the ‘exception’ as other AI companies struggle to add value

item.title: GameStop earnings are coming, as bitcoin looms ever larger for the OG meme stock
item.description: GameStop is slated to report second-quarter earnings after Tuesday’s close, with investors focused on any comments about the company’s bitcoin plans.
